knimeNode.name: Operetta Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a list of exported operetta plate-files into Knime.

fullDescription.intro: Reads a list of exported Operetta result files into Knime.
fullDescription.option:
There are two modes of operation. Either you can choose a single directory in which the nodes will search for Operetta files. The search is applied not only to the direct directory contents but also to also its subfolders.
The second mode is to select a set of files (by keeping the apple/windows-key pressed while selecting files).
